mapper.select: SELECT IF(COUNT(review_id) = 1, 1, 0) FROM Review WHERE place_id = #{placeId} AND user_id = #{userId} AND action NOT IN ('DELETE')
SELECT IF(COUNT(r.review_id) >= 1, 1, 0) FROM Review r LEFT JOIN Place p ON p.place_id = r.place_id WHERE r.place_id = #{placeId} AND r.action NOT IN ('DELETE')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Review(review_id, user_id, place_id, content) VALUES(#{reviewId}, #{userId}, #{placeId}, #{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE Review SET action = #{action} WHERE review_id = #{reviewId}
